Class FinalBoss.AttackHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.ai.FinalBoss.AttackHandler
  • Enclosing class:
    FinalBoss

    private static class FinalBoss.AttackHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This handles all the attack operations for the FinalBoss.
    Since:
    2018-02-27
    Version:
    1.01.01
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:

      • getAttack

        public FinalBoss.Entry getAttack(AIController api)
        Retrieves the best attack FinalBoss.Entry that can be performed with the current state of the game.
        Parameters:
        api - The AIController that allows the FinalBoss to query the state of the game.
        Returns:
        The FinalBoss.Entry attack that should performed.

      • getAttacks

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,FinalBoss.Entry> getAttacks(AIController api)
        Retrieves the weighting for a country that the FinalBoss may attack.
        Parameters:
        api - The AIController that this FinalBoss will use to query the state of the game.
        Returns:
        All the possible attacks and their ratings.

      • shouldBlockLink

        private boolean shouldBlockLink(Country country,
                                Country neighbour,
                                AIController api)
        Retrieves whether or not the link from an enemy neighbour should be blocked according to FinalBoss.
        Parameters:
        country - A friendly Country.
        neighbour - A enemy neighbour Country.
        api - The AIController that this FinalBoss will use to query the state of the game.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the link from an enemy neighbour should be blocked according to FinalBoss.

                      Country neighbour)
        Calculates the rating of an attack between a specified friendly Country and a specified enemy neighbour Country.
        Parameters:
        country - A friendly Country.
        neighbour - A enemy neighbour Country.
